website_summaries.verdict: A lightweight clog that is 100% wooden and can be finished to your preference.
pros: Can be customized to fit your foot
Comfortable to stand in for long periods of time
Designed to be painted or varnished
cons: It would be best to size down when ordering

customer_reviews.title: I love my wooden clogs
customer_reviews.text: I love my wooden clogs. Use them for gardening, and are definitely a conversation starter when anyone sees them. They slide easy off, easy on, and at the door guests think that they are there for decoration. I’ve just ordered my third pair; they’ve lasted about two years each; I really give them a beating. Your feet don’t get wet no matter how much water they receive, and dirt does not stick. My fit was great, with or without socks, but I try to wear them with socks. I highly recommend them if you love gardening as I do. Thank you Amazon for providing them to us!
customer_reviews.author: ¡Able

customer_reviews.title: They make me want to walk along canals and take up impressionistic painting.
customer_reviews.text: They make me want to walk along canals and take up impressionistic painting. With thick socks, they should be every bit as comfortable as you might hope for.
customer_reviews.author: MacMentor

customer_reviews.title: Wooden Clogs
customer_reviews.text: I have a Dutch friend who wears wooden shoes in his garden because dirt will not stick to the bottom of them. These are too big to wear. I tried to return them. Amazon was easy. The seller is out of country and the UPS store said that postage was $50. I declined and kept them. They are good quality, just get a size smaller than you think you need. I went by the European tag on another pair of my shoes. They must run large.
customer_reviews.author: Roxy Girl

customer_reviews.title: I am going to wear these for many years to come
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are not comfortable. I like them for their historical value, for sentimental reasons and I will line them for more comfort and put non slip souls on them. For people who do not wish to wear them and have artistic talents: The make great decorative items.
customer_reviews.author: Regine Tollefsen

customer_reviews.title: Mijn kloppen zit goed! ;-)
customer_reviews.text: Bedank, I like these classic & practical footwear, when I was younger I lived in the Netherlands & learned the Dutch often wore these in farming (useful for me on my Nevada ranch property) in kitchens & in other professions when easy cleaning and wetter situations keeping feet dry and safe
customer_reviews.author: A. N.

customer_reviews.title: Time to go Klompen around the garden...
customer_reviews.text: My wife's Opa always wore his klompen around the garden. When I started building up my garden, and started getting in trouble for tracking dirt into the house, it was time to get my own. They fit well, and are as loud as I'd hoped.
customer_reviews.author: Markus Ayers

customer_reviews.title: These are just great
customer_reviews.text: Feels a little large but I wear heavy socks. I covered with beeswax polish to protect them.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Natural

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my Dutch boyfriend, he loved them :) he has plans to paint them himself. Very pleased
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... be exploring a method to make the interior more comfortable as expected
customer_reviews.text: I'll probably be exploring a method to make the interior more comfortable as expected, but they fit great and look great. Don't know why I like wooden shoes so much, but just have ever since I'd heard of them, and now I have some.
customer_reviews.author: Ruecian

customer_reviews.title: It’s not for everyone!
customer_reviews.text: I have always worn wooden shoes and now that I have a large garden I am happy to wear them once more!
customer_reviews.author: A. Jasko

customer_reviews.title: Sized larger than my shoe size
customer_reviews.text: Would love to exchange for a smaller size. I chose my shoe size but the shoes are sized larger by at least two sizes. Do not know how to exchange. Shoes are made well and look exactly as I expected. Wish I could exchange them.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Parsons

customer_reviews.title: I love em.
customer_reviews.text: I could use a slightly more open fit on the top of the shoe. But I also wear an American sized 14 shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Carpenter

customer_reviews.title: as a child had a pair of wood clogs like these. My intent was to actually wear them ...
customer_reviews.text: I agree with recent reviewers that these are of impressive craftsmanship, yet, are not realistically designed for foot ware. I am a veteran clog wearer, and, as a child had a pair of wood clogs like these. My intent was to actually wear them around the house. As a veteran life-long clog wearer who purchases only European-made clogs I am also familiar with the EU shoe sizes. Therefore, I was shocked at how h-u-g-e (and I do mean huge) these are made despite ordering the correct EU size. My feet are swimming in these. They are far too large, particularly in the the width (but in the length too).
customer_reviews.author: Locquitur

customer_reviews.title: Shipping was higher than advertisement
customer_reviews.text: These shoes will go under the Christmas tree for our kids! They were perfect EXCEPT the shipping which was just under $25!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love these shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes. i bought to combat all the 'allergies' i keep aquiring and losing. raw wood is hard to be allergic to, unlike memory foam. and they are very reasonable for a 'all natural' shoe. i didn't expect them to be so comfortable. oh man i just about can't stand modern shoes now. they support my arches perfectly and everything. i bought a bit too large of a size cuz i was worreid they wouldn't be wide enough- they aren't narrow at all! :) I'm thinking these will be my winter shoes so i can wear fuzzy socks.
customer_reviews.author: Sydney D Galifrey

product_meta.title: World of Clogs.com Round-Toe Plain Traditional All-Wooden Natural Dutch Clogs
product_meta.description: Round-Toe Plain All Wooden Dutch Clogs. Traditional wooden clogs made from willow. These clogs are made entirely from wood. Planed and sanded ready to be painted, stained or varnished if desired. Made in Holland.
feature_bullets: Can be painted, stained or varnished
